title: Didn't recieve my firecracker ward or whatever when I crafted it.

embed.description: The easy way to save screenshots, GIFs, and websites. Make everyone happy by sharing smarter, faster, and with your point crystal clear.

body:
When I crafted this item it said that it had been added to my inventory, but then wasn't there.
Please help, is there any way to get it to my account or something?
Thanks!

replies.body:
It is a confirmed that a bug has appeared that causes some ward skins not to appear in your inventory and they have been investigating it. The wards are still on the accounts, it is just not shown on the menus. In some cases people can't change wards in champ select either.

[Don't worry, Riot are aware of the issue and are working to fix it](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us). You will be able to play with your ward soon :)
Rented for a week or permanent?
One of my wards vanished too. I had it for a bit, but now it's gone.
